Package database.statement

Class SQLStatement

java.lang.Object
database.statement.SQLStatement
public class SQLStatement extends Object
Wrapper class which wraps all SQL builder classes. Allows access to the 4 CRUD SQL statement builders
Version:
1.0 - June 2nd 2023
Author:
Tommy Shan
